resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105046</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105046</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206872</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Forts of Old San Juan: Guardians of the Caribbean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Forts alten San Juan: Wächter der 
Karibischen Meere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les forts de vieux San Juan : Gardiens
des Caraïbes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os forts de San velho Juan: Guardians das 
Caraíbas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I forts di vecchio San Juan: Guardiani dei 
Caraibi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα οχυρά του παλαιού SAN Juan: Φύλακες των 
Καραϊβικών Θαλασσών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fortalezas de viejo San Juan: Guardas 
del Caribe</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides a history of Puerto Rico and the forts Spain established on the island to help protect its growing population and riches in the Caribbean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Geschichte von Puerto Rico zur 
Verfügung und die Forts Spanien, das auf der Insel zur Hilfe 
hergestellt wird, schützen seine wachsende Bevölkerung und riches in
den Karibischen Meeren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit une histoire du Porto Rico et les forts 
Espagne établie sur l'île à l'aide protègent sa population 
croissante et richesse dans les Caraïbes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece um history de Puerto Rico e os forts Spain
estabelecido no console à ajuda protegem seus população de 
crescimento e riches nas Caraíbas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce una storia del Porto Rico ed i forts 
Spagna stabilita sull'isola ad aiuto proteggono la relativi 
popolazione crescente e riches nei Caraibi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει μια ιστορία του Πουέρτο Ρίκο και των οχυρών 
Ισπανία που καθιερώνεται στο νησί για να βοηθήσει να προστατεύσει
τον αυξανόμενο πληθυσμό και τους πλούτους του στις Καραϊβικές 
Θάλασσες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a una historia de Puerto Rico y las 
fortalezas España establecida en la isla a la ayuda protegen su 
población en crecimiento y riquezas en el Caribe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206872</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105046</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-forts-of-old-san-juan-guardians-of-the-caribbean</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
